concept: Define simple classes and create objects to store and process data.

challenges.title: Student Class (Total Marks)
challenges.description: Create a class Student with data members: name (string), m1, m2, m3 (int). Read these values, compute total marks, and print: name total.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: name (single word). Next line: three integers m1 m2 m3.

challenges.title: Rectangle Class (Area)
challenges.description: Create a class Rectangle with data members length and breadth. Add a member function area() that returns length * breadth. Read length and breadth, create an object, and print the area.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: area of the rectangle.
